title: About Scam Watch
description: Empowering consumers through transparency, accountability, and community action against price gouging

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Scam Watch was founded with a clear mission: to combat price gouging and protect consumers from predatory pricing practices, especially during emergencies and times of crisis. We believe that transparency is the most powerful tool in creating accountability and fairness in the marketplace.
mission.paragraph2: Our platform serves as a centralized database where consumers can report, track, and share instances of price gouging. By collecting and analyzing this data, we aim to:

bullets.item1: Expose businesses engaging in unfair pricing practices
bullets.item2: Provide consumers with information needed to make informed decisions
bullets.item3: Assist regulatory agencies by identifying patterns of price gouging
bullets.item4: Create a deterrent effect through public accountability
bullets.item5: Advocate for stronger consumer protection laws and regulations

communityReporting.title: Community Reporting
communityReporting.description: Our platform allows users to submit detailed reports of price gouging incidents. Each report includes the business name, location, price information, photos, and a description of the pricing issue. Reports are verified by our team before being published.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis & Scoring
dataAnalysis.description: We analyze reported data to identify patterns and assign "Scam Scores" to businesses based on factors like the frequency of reports, severity of price increases, and whether the gouging occurred during emergencies. This helps users quickly assess risk.

communityAction.title: Community Action
communityAction.description: Users can search our database, view reported businesses, and make informed choices about where to shop. By sharing this information, we create a powerful incentive for businesses to maintain fair pricing practices even during high-demand periods.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in complete transparency in our operations, data collection methods, and verification processes.

fairness.title: Fairness
fairness.description: We maintain strict verification standards to ensure businesses are not unfairly targeted or misrepresented.

community.title: Community
community.description: We empower communities to protect themselves through collective knowledge and shared experiences.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: We hold businesses accountable for their pricing practices while maintaining the highest ethical standards.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Scam Watch was founded by a team of consumer advocates, data analysts, and technology experts committed to creating fair marketplaces. Our diverse team brings together expertise in consumer protection law, data science, and community organizing.

cta.title: Join the Movement Against Price Gouging
cta.description: Help build a more fair marketplace by reporting price gouging incidents in your community

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or want to get involved? We'd love to hear from you. Get in touch with our team.
